original_text: Moreover there are workmen with thee in abundance, hewers and workers of stone and timber, and all manner of cunning men for every manner of work.
korean_text: 또 장인이 네게 많이 있나니 곧 석수와 목수와 온갖 일에 익숙한 모든 사람이니라

sentences.original_text: Moreover there are workmen with thee in abundance
sentences.korean_translation: 게다가 네게 함께할 일꾼들이 풍부하게 있다

sentences.original_text: hewers and workers of stone and timber
and all manner of cunning men
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 종류의 기술 있는 자들
